synopsis: Mikey, Angie and Jeremy are pulled into another world; Mikey meets a kind Digimon who needs help to battle a Digimon of the evil Bagra Empire.

title.jp: He is Shoutmon, Hear Him Roar

synopsis: The Bagra Army attacks the village where Shoutmon lives; Mikey learns that Shoutmon wants to become King of the Digital World.
Mikey, Angie and Jeremy become allies with Shoutmon and his Team Fusion Fighters; a boy with a blue fusion loader appears and asks Mikey to join his team.
Mikey and his friends transfer to the Island Zone in search of the Code Crown and the protection it offers.
Neptunemon discovers that the Code Crown is inside Whamon; Mikey and Shoutmon try to retrieve the crown while avoiding Flymon.
When Mikey's team is surrounded by Seadramons, Christopher appears and offers to help in exchange for the digi-memory card.
Mikey's team arrives in the Magma Zone; SkullMeramon tries to capture Mikey and his team.
AncientVolcamon threatens to destroy one of the Magma Zone caves with the team inside.
Mikey and Dorulumon are captured by Tactimon; Christopher causes a distraction, giving Mikey's friends a chance to attempt a rescue.
Mikey saves Knightmon from a lake of ice; Knightmon takes Mikey to his castle.
Angie becomes concerned when she hears Beastmon talking in her sleep about how the Digital World and the human world are facing a crisis.

title.jp: Treasure, Traps and Trouble - Oh My!

synopsis: Mikey's team searches for treasure in the Sand Zone; the team falls into an underground Bagra base.
While exiting the ruins, Mikey's team is fired upon by Reapmon.
Mikey's team is surrounded by enemies; when Pharaohmon arrives the team manages to escape; Pharaohmon tells the team that they may be able to use the fusion loader to save Reapmon.
Laylamon forces Mikey and his friends to go to the Sky Zone, where the police presence is strong.

title.jp: A Dark Cloud Over the Sky Zone!

synopsis: Lucemon reveals his wicked nature shortly after being elected the new president of the Sky Zone.
Lucemon captures Nene; Shoutmon and company must attack to save Nene.

Mikey and others arrive in the Jungle Zone, where strong Digimon live. However, they arrive in midair in the sky before falling toward the ground. As they plummet, Beelzemon goes to save Akari and Zenjiro who are falling at a fast rate. In result, the team gets separated: Beelzemon, Cutemon, Akari and Zenjiro as one group while Mikey and Shoutmon are with everyone else. Once safe on the ground, Mikey sends out a search party for the lost Akari and Zenjiro. While separated, Akari and Zenjiro encounter the protector of the jungle, Stingmon and his love Lilamon who is convinced the two humans are a loving couple. Meanwhile Kiriha and Nene make their appearances in the zone while Mikey and his group of digimon run into Tactimon!

DarkKnightmon and Nene have made their way into the Guardian of the Jungle Zone's dwelling after Stingmon was saved by a mysterious light and dragged through the glowing doors. Xros Heart tries to get in but are met with a barrier that Lilamon tells them they can only enter by showing Deckerdramon a display of love and devotion through the legendary "Love Love Dance". Akari and Zenjirou are the ones who have to do the dance as a couple but refuse out of embarrassment, insisting they are not a couple. Will they be able to break into the barrier to save Nene and protect Stingmon and Deckerdramon!? Meanwhile Tactimon has Bagramon take the seal off his sword and Mikey tries to get Kiriha and Sparrowmon to join their rescue mission.
The Fusion Fighters must work with the Digimon in the Dust Zone to get MIkey's fusion loader back from Grand Locomon. Meanwhile, AxeKnightmon captures Christopher.
Puppetmon helps Mikey's team escape from AxeKnightmon; Sparrowmon reveals that AxeKnightmon has thrown Nene in prison.
While traveling to the next zone, the Fusion Fighters are caught by the Digimon Arukadhimon.

title.jp: Laughing All the Way to the Code Crown!

synopsis: Mikey's team goes to the Shinobi Zone, where Musyamon has captured the Monitamons' castle and princess.
Mikey and the Fusion Fighters must protect the Monitamons' village from an attack; Jeremy leads a group on a rescue mission to save the princess.
Christopher obtains the Code Crown from Mercurymon and has a battle with Blastmon.

title.jp: Shoutmon: Bogus King or the Real Thing?

synopsis: As the Disc Zone collapses, Mikey transfers all the Digimon over to the Warrior Zone, but Blastmon cling onto some of them.
Mikey finds and rescues the Digimon known as Spadamon, who explains that the Sweets Zone has been taken over by the Bagra Army's Matadormon.
In the Sweet Zone's underground, Mikey and the gang attempt to search for and save everyone only to find themselves surrounded by Raremon.

title.jp: Fall of the Final Code Crown

synopsis: Mikey and the gang come to the Sword Zone, where all Digimon hope to become real swordsmen, but Grademon arrives and attacks them.
Mikey, Angie & Jeremy learn that their time in the Digital World was about half a day in human world time and that nobody believes their story.
